column5: Thought you guys might like seeing some pics.  It wasn't me fishing but it was my bro in law and his family up at a cottage rental with pontoon rental on Cache Bay. He sent me the pics everyday and man was I jealous.  Mostly two of them fishing but the other two joined in on occasion and landed a few too. In total it was 57 pike (34 for him) and a few LMB, SMB and a white bass. At first I thought it was a hybrid striper but upon closer look, I think it's a big white bass.     Here are some of the bigger fish from their haul:                                   Notice the spoon on this one. He's a big Pats fan:
That looks like a good time!
Can't complain with results like that!
Very cool but have you notice a strong family resemblance in the facial features? lol Thanks for the view of the Nip it is one of my favorite places to fish.    Art
Very cool but have you notice a strong family resemblance in the facial features? lol Thanks for the view of the Nip it is one of my favorite places to fish.    Art  LOL!
Nice report! You guys really layer on that sunblock on the face, eh? So pale!
It looks like they all had a very good time with plenty of fish.  Looks like a well rounded family to!
Some of those fish look like they are deflated!!  Sorry I couldn't resist!!
you guys are killing me with these jokes!
Looks like the Moonies had a great trip.
Looks like a super fun trip...and that white bass is huge!
Are you guys wanted somewhere? YES, I have seen WANTED pictures in 3 Providences and several states for using CHEATER spoons
Im willing to bet your casts were very smooth and accurate!  Tight laces!!!
